backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state, serving as a minimal backend placeholder.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: clickable name landing page, apology message display, pink/red color scheme, and romantic visual theme with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing the apology reveal app with romantic styling, custom animations, and OKLCH color system.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, using neutral grayscale values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx, titled 'Maham Apology Website'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component implementing an interactive apology page where clicking 'Maham' reveals a heartfelt apology message with animated hearts and smooth transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages backend actor instances with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file with no backend query hooks since this is a frontend-only application.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with pink/red romantic gradient background, Playfair Display and Inter fonts, OKLCH color variables, and custom fadeIn/apologyReveal animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point wrapping App with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette using OKLCH color space, extended theme with sidebar/chart colors, custom fonts (Inter, Playfair Display), border radius variables, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking for a single-page apology website for Maham with interactive name click functionality, pink/red color scheme with white text, and four implemented features including landing page, apology message display, color scheme, and romantic visual theme.
